listing.name: Puffy Delivery
listing.intro_body:
Welcome to Puffy Delivery!

 

Puffy Delivery is an online cannabis collective for medical and recreational cannabis users that offers cannabis delivery directly to your front door.

 

Puffy Delivery only carries products that have been lab tested and meet all state packaging requirements. We are a fully licensed cannabis collective and operate legally under California state law.

 

We offer same-day delivery to Los Angeles, Orange County, San Fernando Valley, San Francisco, Sacramento, and San Diego.

 

Our ETAs are based on location and time. We will try our best to provide an accurate ETA but please note it may be subject to change at any time.

 

You can easily process your order through Weedmaps! If you would like to text in your order, please send the first-time customer required information to the number listed, and a Puffy representative will be in contact with you once your profile has been created.

 

**prices do not include taxes
listing.description:
Puffy Delivery is fully compliant with Prop 64 and pursuant to California state law to charge taxes on all cannabis purchases. No customer is entirely exempt from taxes.  

 

We offer FREE DELIVERY on orders with a subtotal of over $50 (before taxes). For orders under $50 we charge an $8 flat-rate shipping fee.

 

Please note that all items must be taxed regardless of discounts or promotions.

 

**Unfortunately, we can only accept one discount per order, per day.

 

***The following brands CANNOT be discounted: Alien Labs, Cookies, and Connected.
listing.first_time_announcement:
Please text the following information:

 

- Picture of valid government issued ID or passport

- Photo of yourself holding your ID for verification

- Full delivery address with city and zip code



** first-time customers receive 30% off the order.
listing.announcement: Please note that our menu lists inventory from all of our California hubs. Once you submit your order via Weedmaps a Puffy representative will determine inventory in your area, and contact you to finalize your order prior to shipment/delivery.
